title: Bellum et Pax - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Bellum et Pax - Europa Universalis IV mod


Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder
 

DESCRIPTION
This mod adds tons of new nations, events, provinces, religions and many more. Also, the new start date of the game is the 1st january 1400. 


________________ 


Features: 

- New startdate: 1400 
- Realistic Terrain (Zeeland, Venice, Bosporus) 
- Balanced Modifiers, Country Events and Decisions for MP and SP. 
- Many new nations all over the world. 
- New Cultures 
- New religions like Tengri, Sami or the religions of the aztecs and inca! 
- New formable empires, form the celtic union as scotland or ireland or unite the arabs! 
- Balanced tradenodes. 
- Many new provinces, especially in europe. 
- New and balanced Ideas! + Idea Tech Tree 



Planned features: 

- New nations and formable empires. 
- More national Ideas and Ideagroups. 
- More historical events and decisions.
